Mit̕ṭen: Am tutluc̕ ńapam kate rạskạń bujhạo keda
leak̕ jo̱s: jo̱to̱ ho̱ṛ lạgit̕, duniạ re jo̱to̱ ko bhujhạu ar apnar pạrsi teso̱do̱r daṛeak̕ ma .
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

Mit̕ṭen: Aleak̕ jo̱s: saṅsar reeak̕ jankari ko jarwaya ar noa jo̱to̱ ko lạgit̕ ńam o̱co̱ ar bebhar o̱co̱ koa.
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
